member.name: T:BookPubDB.DTOs.BookDto
member.summary: Represents a data transfer object (DTO) for a book. This DTO is used to transfer book-related data between different layers of the application while maintaining encapsulation and separation of concerns.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.DTOs.BookDto.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the book.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.DTOs.BookDto.PublishDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when the book was published.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.DTOs.BookDto.BasePrice
member.summary: Gets or sets the base price of the book.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.DTOs.BookDto.AuthorId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the author associated with the book.
